definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: cause to drink water, give to drink (NH Hiph. id.; Ar. saqay I. give to drink; Sab. [[סקי]] be irrigated Fell:ZMG liv (1900), 246, [[מסקי]] drinks Hom:Chr 124, [[מסתקין]] id. DHM:Hofmus., No. 1, l. 7; Eth. saqaya water, irrigate; As. šaḳû I. = Heb. Hiph., Aram. [[שְׁקָא]], 4qo0: Aph.);—for

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: v. II. [[שָׁתָה]];—Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְהִשְׁקָה]] Ge 2:6 +, sf. [[וְהִשְׁקָהּ]] Nu 5:27; 2 ms. consec. [[וְהִשְׁקִיתָ]] Nu 20:8 +; 1 s. consec. [[וְהִשְׁקֵיתִי]] Ez Eze 32:6, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַשְׁקֶה]] Nu 5:26, [[וַיַּשְׁקְ]] Ge 29:10 +, etc.; Imv. ms. sf. [[הַשְׁקִ֫הוּ]] Pr 25:21; fs. sf. [[הַשְׁקׂ֫ינִי]] Ge 24:43 +; Inf. cstr. [[הַשְׁקוֹת]] Ge 2:10 +, sf. [[הַשְׁקׂתוֹ]] Ge 24:19; Pt. [[מַשְׁקֶה]] Ps 104:13, cstr. Hb Hab 2:15 (v. also I., II. [[מַשְׁקֶה]]);—

water, irrigate, ground: subj. mist Ge 2:6, river v:Ge 2:10 (both J), spring Joe 4:18; subj. ´[[י]]: Is 27:3 ([[כֶּרֶם]]), Ez Eze 17:7 ([[גֶּפֶן]]), both in fig., fig. also Eze 32:6 water land [[מִדָּם]]; lit. c. [[מִן]] of source Ps 104:13 ([[הָרִים]]) and (subj. man) Ec 2:6 ([[יַעַר]]).

water, give drink to, usu. human subj., acc. of beast, Ge 24:14, Ge 24:46, Ge 24:46, Ge 29:2 ([[מִן]] of source), v:Ge 29:3, v:Ge 29:7, v:Ge 29:8, v:Ge 29:10, Ex 2:16, Ex 2:17, Ex 2:19 (all J), Ps 104:11 (subj. springs); acc. pers. Ge 21:19 (E), Ge 24:18, Ge 24:19, Ge 24:45 (J), Hb Hab 2:15 (fig.), Is 43:20 (´[[י]]: subj.), Ps 78:15 (id.), 2Ch 28:15, c. [[ב]] of vessel Es 1:7; c. acc. pers. et animal. Nu 20:8 (P); give one something to drink, acc. pers. + rei (water, wine, etc.), Am 2:12, Ge 19:32, Ge 19:33, Ge 19:34, Ge 19:35, Ge 24:43 (all J), Ju Jdg 4:19, 1Sa 30:11, 2Sa 23:15 = 1Ch 11:15, Job 22:7, cf. Ct So 8:2 ([[מִיַּיִן]]); fig. Je 8:14, Je 9:14, Je 16:7, Je 23:15, Je 25:15, Ps 69:22, cf. [[וְנַחַל]] [[עֲדָנֶיךָ תַשְׁקֵם]] Ps 36:9, and [[וַתַּשְׁקֵ֫מוֹ בִּדְמָעוֹת]] Ps 80:6; acc. rei om., lit. Ju Jdg 4:19, Ex 32:20 (E), fig. Je 25:17.—Vid. also I. [[מַשְׁקֶה]] infra.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וּמׂחַ עַחְמוֹתָיו]] [[יְשֻׁקֶּה]] Job 21:24 the marrow of his bones is watered, (refreshed, invigorated).—[[נשׁקה]] Am 8:8 v. [[שׁקע]]. p. 1054.
